ITEM.TITLE: HTML5 and CSS3 Responsive Web Design Cookbook
ITEM.AUTHOR: Benjamin LaGrone
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Learn the secrets of developing responsive websites capable of interfacing with today's mobile Internet devices

ITEM.TITLE: Expert MySQL Second Edition
ITEM.AUTHOR: Charles Bell
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
MySQL has been identified as the world’s most popular open-source database and the fastest-growing database system in the industry. This book presents some of the topics of advanced database systems, examines the architecture of MySQL, and provides an expert’s workbook for examining, integrating, and modifying the MySQL source code for use in enterprise environments. The book provides insight into how to modify the MySQL system to 
meet the unique needs of system integrators and educators alike.

ITEM.TITLE: CodeIgniter 1.7 Professional Development
ITEM.AUTHOR: Adam Griffiths
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Become a CodeIgniter expert with professional tools, techniques, and extended libraries

ITEM.TITLE: CMS Design Using PHP and jQuery
ITEM.AUTHOR: Kae Verens
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Build and improve your in-house PHP CMS by enhancing it with jQuery

ITEM.TITLE: CakePHP Application Development
ITEM.AUTHOR: Ahsanul Bari, Anupom Syam
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Step-by-step introduction to rapid web development using the open-source MVC CakePHP framework

ITEM.TITLE: Beginning Smartphone Web Development
ITEM.AUTHOR: Gail Rahn Frederick with Rajesh Lal
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Building JavaScript, CSS, HTML and Ajax-based Applications for iPhone, Android, Palm Pre, BlackBerry, Windows Mobile, and Nokia S60

ITEM.TITLE: Beginning PHP and PostgreSQL 8 From Novice to Professional
ITEM.AUTHOR: W. Jason Gilmore and Robert H. Treat
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
These are exciting times for the open source movement, and perhaps no two projects better 
represent this development paradigm’s incredible level of progress than the PHP scripting 
language and PostgreSQL database server.

ITEM.TITLE: Beginning PHP and MySQL E-Commerce
ITEM.AUTHOR: Cristian Darie and Emilian Balanescu
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
This practical PHP and MySQL tutorial will teach you how to successfully design and build 
fully featured e-commerce web sites.

ITEM.TITLE: Beginning jQuery
ITEM.AUTHOR: Jack Franklin
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
For your convenience Apress has placed some of the front 
matter material after the index. Please use the Bookmarks 
and Contents at a Glance links to access them.

ITEM.TITLE: Beginning HTML5 and CSS3
ITEM.AUTHOR: Richard Clark, Oli Studholme, Christopher Murphy and Divya Manian
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Who is this book for? 
Beginning HTML5 and CSS3: The Web Evolved is aimed at anybody with a basic knowledge of HTML and CSS. If you have just recently dipped your toes into the world of HTML or CSS, or if you’ve been developing sites for years, there will be something in this book for you. However, you will get the most out of this book if you’ve had a play with HTML5 and CSS3 but don’t yet fully understand all it has to offer. This book is packed full of practical, real-world  advice and examples to help you master modern web standards.

ITEM.TITLE: AJAX and PHP Building Responsive Web Applications
ITEM.AUTHOR: Cristian Darie, Bogdan Brinzarea, Filip Cherecheş-Toşa, Mihai Bucica
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Enhance the user experience of your PHP website 
using AJAX with this practical tutorial featuring detailed 
case studies

ITEM.TITLE: Advanced PHP Programming
ITEM.AUTHOR: George Schlossnagle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
A practical guide to developing large-scale 
Web sites and applications with PHP 5

ITEM.TITLE: Thủ thuật SEO
ITEM.AUTHOR: Tỉnh Trần
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Tối ưu hóa công cụ tìm kiếm (SEO) là một trong những công việc khó nhưng 
màu mỡ và mang lại lợi nhuận to lớn cho các công ty và doanh nghiệp cũng 
như các cá nhân đang kinh doanh trên internet. 
Bất cứ ai muốn kiếm tiền trên mạng, kinh doanh trên internet hay muốn tạo thu 
nhập trên internet đều cần có những kiến thức & kinh nghiệm về SEO để tăng 
lượng truy cập cũng như tăng lượng khách hàng tiềm năng cho mình.

ITEM.TITLE: Facebook Application Development for Dummies
ITEM.AUTHOR: Jesse Stay
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Learn to:
• Install the Facebook toolkit and use the Graph API
• Use Facebook Markup Language and Facebook Query Language
• Create applications for marketing and making money
• Boost your brand with a Facebook page

ITEM.TITLE: Advanced Java Networking
ITEM.AUTHOR: Không xác định
ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
By now you've seen all the hype, read all the books, and discovered all the wonders of 
Java. But most of us still use C++ or C to create our hard-core applications, saving 
Java for our Web pages or leaving it to HTML jocks to fiddle with. Doing so denies 
us the opportunity to use a programming language that makes interfacing with a 
computer infinitely easier, with less frustration and faster results. 
Java is much more than "Dancing Dukes" or a programming language for Web pages. 
It is a strong alternative to the masochistic programming of the past, in which 
countless months were spent debugging compared to the mere days it took to code the 
initial concept. Java allows us to spend more time in the conceptual phase of software 
design, thinking up new and creative ways to bring the vast knowledge of the Internet 
and its many users to our desktop. 
Today, our information, and its steady flow, is garnered from the Internet and the 
millions of fellow computer users around the world. Up until now, you've no doubt 
designed programs to interface with that knowledge using C or C++. Java will change 
all of that. In addition to its ability to create adorable and functional user interfaces 
quickly and easily is Java's ability to easily connect to the Internet. Java is, after 
all,the Internet Language.
